label: 元禄
対訳語: The era name for the years 1688-1704
本: Osaka: The Merchants' Capital of Early Modern Japan . Cornell University Press . 1999
著者: McClain, James L.  and Wakita Osamu
説明文: Refers more generally to the decades at the end of seventeenth century and beginning of the eighteenth that witnessed the flowering of urban culture.
